Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • Account

  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Account(java.lang.String name, int startingBalance)
      Constructor to create an instance of an Account

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backup(int id, Account backup)
      Method that checks balances of the main and backup Account and transfers money between both accounts accordingly.
      void deposit(int id, int amount)
      Method to deposit money into an Account
      void printStatement()
      Method to print the statement of transactions from each Account Statement contains information about the transaction number (and which thread it ran on - using id), amount withdrawn or deposited and the current Balance.
      void withdraw(int id, int amount)
      Method to withdraw money from an Account

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        public Account(java.lang.String name,
               int startingBalance)
        Constructor to create an instance of an Account
        Parameters:
        name - = the name of the Account, e.g. main
        startingBalance - = the initial balance of the Account

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public void deposit(int id,
                    int amount)
        Method to deposit money into an Account
        Parameters:
        id - = the id of the Thread in which the Account is running on
        amount - = amount of money to be deposited into the Account

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(int id,
                     int amount)
        Method to withdraw money from an Account
        Parameters:
        id - = the id of the Thread in which the Account is running on
        amount - = amount of money to be withdrawn from the Account

      • backup

        public void backup(int id,
                   Account backup)
        Method that checks balances of the main and backup Account and transfers money between both accounts accordingly.
        Parameters:
        id - = the id of the Thread in which the Account is running on
        backup - = the secondary bank Account

      • printStatement

        public void printStatement()
        Method to print the statement of transactions from each Account Statement contains information about the transaction number (and which thread it ran on - using id), amount withdrawn or deposited and the current Balance.
